description.db:para: This table is used by the Call Center module to store the definition of the call queues / flows. More information can be found at: &Marina.Rodeo_MOD_DOC;call_center.html.

column.name: flowid
column.description: The unique ID of the flow in the Call Center module - to be used to identify the flow/queue in the module and from outside the module; It is an alphanumerical string.

column.name: priority
column.description: The priority of the flow (in relation to the other flows); 0 is maximum priority and calls for this flow will be processed first all the time.

column.name: skill
column.description: The skill required from an agent in order to receive calls from this flow/queue.

column.name: prependcid
column.description: Aphanumerical prefix to be added to the caller displayname when sending calls from this flow to agents (so agent - serving muliple flows - can see what was the flow the call was received on.

column.name: max_wrapup_time
column.description: The maximum warpup time (in seconds) allowed for the call terminated via this flow. This value will limit the default or per-agent wrapup time. A 0 value means no limit/max defined.

column.name: dissuading_hangup
column.description: If set to true (non zero value), the calls diverted to dissuading destination will be closed after the dissuading terminates (useful when using a playback for dissuading).

column.name: dissuading_onhold_th
column.description: For how long (in seconds) a call will wait in the queue before getting a dissuading redirect.

column.name: dissuading_ewt_th
column.description: The Estimated Waiting Time (in seconds) threshold that will redirect a new incoming call (not queued yet) to the dissuading destination.

column.name: dissuading_qsize_th
column.description: The Size of the Queue (as already waiting calls in this flow) that will redirect a new incoming call (not queued yet) to the dissuading destination.

column.name: message_welcome
column.description: SIP URI point to a media server; this is used for playing the welcome message for this flow.

column.name: message_queue
column.description: SIP URI point to a media server; this is used for playing the onhold message for this flow. IMPORTANT - this message must cycle and media server must never hung up on it.

column.name: message_dissuading
column.description: SIP URI point to a media server; this is used for playing the dissuading message for this flow.

column.name: message_flow_id
column.description: SIP URI point to a media server; this is used for playing the name of the flow id to the agent before delivering a call to him.
